mapper.sql: pull_log_.id AS pull_log_id, pull_log_.success AS pull_log_success, pull_log_.name AS pull_log_name, pull_log_.source_address AS pull_log_source_address, pull_log_.operator AS pull_log_operator, pull_log_.remark AS pull_log_remark, pull_log_.success_quantity AS pull_log_success_quantity, pull_log_.update_quantity AS pull_log_update_quantity, pull_log_.insert_quantity AS pull_log_insert_quantity, pull_log_.request_date AS pull_log_request_date, pull_log_.create_date AS pull_log_create_date, pull_log_.url AS pull_log_url
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pull_log ( success, `name`, source_address, operator, remark, success_quantity, update_quantity, insert_quantity, request_date, create_date, url ) VALUES ( #{success,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE pull_log
success = #{success,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_address = #{sourceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success_quantity = #{successQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_quantity = #{updateQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_quantity = #{insertQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, request_date = #{requestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
